comments:
Hi,

I upgraded from 3.0RC2 to 3.0 release.

Now when I try to start eclipse the splash screen comes up, and then an error 
message appears referring me to the log file.

I had installed the AJDT for AspectJ and was able to run it, prior to copying 
the latest release of Eclipse (unzipped the file into the correct directories).

The contents of the log file are :

I needed to uninstall and re-install AJDT.  Everything works OK now
